abstract: Baseball Roundup; Oakland Athletics defeat Detroit Tigers, 7-5, to complete three-game sweep; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Athletics completed a three-game sweep of the Tigers, who lost their seventh straight.

headline.main: Athletics Earn Sweep as Tigers Lose 7th in Row
headline.print_headline: Athletics Earn Sweep as Tigers Lose 7th in Row

snippet: The Athletics completed a three-game sweep of the Tigers, who lost their seventh straight.
